ComicInfo.Summary:
What is the source of the mysterious Gen-Factor? Why are Bounty Hunters from another dimension chasing a not-so-ordinary college student code-named Sigma? And who will protect the world from the danger of Damocles?
In Fire From Heaven, the secrets are revealed!
WildStorm's 1996 crossover finally exposes the truth behind the Gen-Factor, the bio-chemical agent that gave the men of Team 7 --and their children, the Gen 13-- their phenomenal powers... and why Team 7 received those powers in the first place.
The hidden agenda of Miles Craven is disclosed. After working for decades to make his sinister ambitions a reality, can even death stop Craven and his mad schemes?
WildStorm's mightiest heroes confront Kaizen Gamorra, who holds many dark secrets in the security of his island stronghold, including the true identity of the young man called Sigma.
Meanwhile, a madman shatters dimensional barriers and destroys worlds to recover the life he once had. His herald, The Sword, is already here. Damocles is coming...
Story continues in:
- Sigma #1 - Fire From Heaven Prelude 2 of 3.
- Deathblow #26 - Fire From Heaven, Prelude 3 - Choosing up
ComicInfo.Title: Fire From Heaven; Prelude 1
